title: The Chicest Cover-Ups to Elevate Every Beach Moment
description: Go from a swim to the streets with these pretty options.
excerpt: Go from a swim to the streets with these pretty options.

html:
Juillet Swimwear Gingham Wrap Skirt

Invest in one of the sweetest prints (and colors) of the season with this pink gingham skirt. It’s cute enough to wear on its own with a one-piece swimsuit or the adorable matching bikini.

Sizes: XS-L

Colors: Pink

Materials: 80% nylon, 20% elastane

Anemos L.A. Button-Down Wrap Mini Dress

There aren’t too many things more stylish than a great striped shirt, especially if you’re leaning into the nautical movement. Keep it simple and go sans pants or button it up over your favorite pair of jeans for a Parisian-chic look.

Sizes: XS-2XL

Colors: Azure Stripe, Natural Stripe

Materials: Italian stretch twill

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Chic Gal 2 Pieces Sarong Bathing Suit Wrap

More often than not, less is more. An undeniably chic black or white sarong will come in handy on any jaunt to the beach. Lucky you, these two styles come as a set, so you get more for a fraction of the price.

Sizes: One Size

Colors: 28 options

Customer review: “I’ve had this sarong in both black and baby blue for two summers now, and I still love them. They're lightweight, sheer in a flattering way, and add just the right touch of coverage for pool or beach days. The fabric has held up really well—no snags, no fading. Super easy to tie and toss in a beach bag. Stylish and practical—definitely a go-to swim cover-up for me.”

Andrea Iyamah Teri Crochet Cut-Out Maxi Dress

For a complete ensemble that’s worthy of taking up space in your carry-on, count on the crochet dress. This one earns bonus points with its fringe details and cutout silhouette.

Sizes: XS-2XL

Colors: Cream

Materials: 65% polyester, 35% cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Toteme Striped Cotton Pareo

If you’re a fan of Totome’s pajama-inspired sets, there’s a pareo that you can bring with you on your next visit to the pool.

Sizes: One size

Colors: Brick

Materials: 80% organic cotton, 20% silk

Solid & Striped The Charlie Eyelet Cotton Shorts

One of the best parts of summer dressing is having fun with all the different styles of shorts. This pair makes the perfect swimsuit cover-up, thanks to large eyelets and an adjustable drawstring. Pair it with the matching top to complete your look.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Cornflower Blue

Materials: 100% cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Tory Burch Fringe Tunic

Every resort wardrobe needs a tunic. Of course, Tory Burch makes one of the chicest designs, accented with a fringe hemline.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Vintage Champagne

Customer review: “I loved this dress the moment I saw it online. Did I need another caftan? Thought about it for a minute and decided... yes, I do. It is lovely; the fabric is light and sheer, and the fringe is so fun, kind of a hemp. I bought a cream-colored slip (Commando) to wear underneath because I intend to wear it as a fun party dress. Love. It!”

Zazul Sarong Cover-Up

The timeless sarong gets a playful update with this prismatic knit print. Looking for something else in the same silhouette? This one comes in a host of different patterns to test.

Sizes: One Size

Colors: 44 options

Customer review: “Love this cover-up so much! I love the colors and the pattern and the coverage is perfect. I thought it would be itchy but it is so comfy.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Nia Thomas Sessa Shirt Tawny Brown XL

Look for craft-inspired pieces like this cool crochet shirt to make going from the beach to somewhere else a cinch.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Tawny Brown

Materials: 100% cotton

Agua by Agua Bendita Luna Ceiba Cover-Up

Lean into the charm of a feminine, floral frock with help from Agua by Agua Bendita. While you’re at it, grab one of the brand’s equally cute swimsuits to complete your ensemble.

Sizes: One Size

Colors: Ceiba

Materials: 100% cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Puwei Hollow Out Crochet Cover-Up

Here’s a black crochet cover-up that plays with proportions, offering a high-low silhouette that whispers chic.

Sizes: One Size

Colors: Black, Beige, White

Customer review: “This is the cutest thing I have ever bought from Amazon. It’s one size and fits my 38D chest. I’m 5’4” and 150 pounds and it fits great—not baggy or tight. It goes with everything. I can’t wait to wear it.”

Zaful Long Sleeve Beach Shirt

Tailored shirting is the easiest way to look polished at the pool. This option earns bonus points for its soft, fluid fabric and tie detail.

Sizes: One Size

Colors: Light Coffee, Black

Materials: 100% polyester

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Zimmermann Rhiannon Terry Cloth Minidress

The functionality of a towel meets the chicness of a dress in this standout design from Zimmermann. Add it to your summer wardrobe and prepare for the compliments to roll in.

Sizes: 4-12

Colors: Black/Cream

Materials: 100% cotton

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
